title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 752-1.4 - Clinical laboratory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 752-1.4 - Clinical laboratory

State Regulations

When laboratory services are provided, the operator
shall ensure that the laboratory complies with the certification and permit
requirements of article 5, title V of the Public Health Law. If the center
makes arrangements for the provision of clinical laboratory services with a
laboratory outside the center, the operator shall also ensure that any such
laboratory has a current valid laboratory permit as required by article 5, title V of the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
752-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
